mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Synship.tt_idcard_histroy (source_order_id, order_channel_id, ship_phone, ship_name, id_card, audit_result, reason, function, isSuccess, message, result, ip, create_time, update_time, create_person, update_person) VALUES (#{source_order_id}, #{order_channel_id}, #{ship_phone}, #{ship_name}, #{id_card}, #{audit_result}, #{reason}, #{function}, #{isSuccess}, #{message}, #{result}, #{ip}, NOW(), NOW(), #{create_person}, #{update_person})
